verses.verse: And it came to pass <WH1961> after <WH310> the plague, <WH4046> that the Lord <WH3068> spoke <WH559> unto <WH413> Moses <WH4872> and unto <WH413> Eleazar <WH499> the son <WH1121> of Aaron <WH175> the priest, <WH3548> saying, <WH559>

Take <WH5375> <WH853> the sum <WH7218> of all <WH3605> the congregation <WH5712> of the children <WH1121> of Israel, <WH3478> from twenty <WH6242> years <WH8141> old <WH4480> <WH1121> and upward, <WH4605> throughout their fathers' <WH1> house, <WH1004> all <WH3605> that are able to go <WH3318> to war <WH6635> in Israel. <WH3478>
And Moses <WH4872> and Eleazar <WH499> the priest <WH3548> spoke <WH1696> with <WH854> them in the plains <WH6160> of Moab <WH4124> by <WH5921> Jordan <WH3383> near Jericho, <WH3405> saying, <WH559>

Take the sum of the people, from twenty <WH6242> years <WH8141> old <WH4480> <WH1121> and upward; <WH4605> as <WH834> the LORD <WH3068> commanded <WH6680> <WH853> Moses <WH4872> and the children <WH1121> of Israel, <WH3478> which went forth <WH3318> out of the land <WH4480> <WH776> of Egypt. <WH4714>

Reuben, <WH7205> the eldest son <WH1060> of Israel: <WH3478> the children <WH1121> of Reuben; <WH7205> Hanoch, <WH2585> of whom cometh the family <WH4940> of the Hanochites: <WH2599> of Pallu, <WH6396> the family <WH4940> of the Palluites: <WH6384>
Of Hezron, <WH2696> the family <WH4940> of the Hezronites: <WH2697> of Carmi, <WH3756> the family <WH4940> of the Carmites. <WH3757>

These <WH428> are the families <WH4940> of the Reubenites: <WH7206> and they that were numbered <WH6485> of them were <WH1961> forty <WH705> and three <WH7969> thousand <WH505> and seven <WH7651> hundred <WH3967> and thirty. <WH7970>
And the sons <WH1121> of Pallu; <WH6396> Eliab. <WH446>

And the sons <WH1121> of Eliab; <WH446> Nemuel, <WH5241> and Dathan, <WH1885> and Abiram. <WH48> This <WH1931> is that Dathan <WH1885> and Abiram, <WH48> which were famous <WH7148> in the congregation, <WH5712> who <WH834> strove <WH5327> against <WH5921> Moses <WH4872> and against <WH5921> Aaron <WH175> in the company <WH5712> of Korah, <WH7141> when they strove <WH5327> against <WH5921> the LORD: <WH3068>

And the earth <WH776> opened <WH6605> <WH853> her mouth, <WH6310> and swallowed them up together <WH1104> <WH853> with <WH854> Korah, <WH7141> when that company <WH5712> died, <WH4191> what time the fire <WH784> devoured <WH398> two hundred <WH3967> and <WH853> fifty <WH2572> men: <WH376> and they became <WH1961> a sign. <WH5251>
Notwithstanding the children <WH1121> of Korah <WH7141> died <WH4191> not. <WH3808>

The sons <WH1121> of Simeon <WH8095> after their families: <WH4940> of Nemuel, <WH5241> the family <WH4940> of the Nemuelites: <WH5242> of Jamin, <WH3226> the family <WH4940> of the Jaminites: <WH3228> of Jachin, <WH3199> the family <WH4940> of the Jachinites: <WH3200>
Of Zerah, <WH2226> the family <WH4940> of the Zarhites: <WH2227> of Shaul, <WH7586> the family <WH4940> of the Shaulites. <WH7587>
These <WH428> are the families <WH4940> of the Simeonites, <WH8099> twenty <WH6242> and two <WH8147> thousand <WH505> and two hundred. <WH3967>

The children <WH1121> of Gad <WH1410> after their families: <WH4940> of Zephon, <WH6827> the family <WH4940> of the Zephonites: <WH3831> of Haggi, <WH2291> the family <WH4940> of the Haggites: <WH2291> of Shuni, <WH7764> the family <WH4940> of the Shunites: <WH7765>
Of Ozni, <WH244> the family <WH4940> of the Oznites: <WH244> of Eri, <WH6179> the family <WH4940> of the Erites: <WH6180>
Of Arod, <WH720> the family <WH4940> of the Arodites: <WH722> of Areli, <WH692> the family <WH4940> of the Arelites. <WH692>

These <WH428> are the families <WH4940> of the children <WH1121> of Gad <WH1410> according to those that were numbered <WH6485> of them, forty <WH705> thousand <WH505> and five <WH2568> hundred. <WH3967>
The sons <WH1121> of Judah <WH3063> were Er <WH6147> and Onan: <WH209> and Er <WH6147> and Onan <WH209> died <WH4191> in the land <WH776> of Canaan. <WH3667>

And the sons <WH1121> of Judah <WH3063> after their families <WH4940> were; <WH1961> of Shelah, <WH7956> the family <WH4940> of the Shelanites: <WH8024> of Pharez, <WH6557> the family <WH4940> of the Pharzites: <WH6558> of Zerah, <WH2226> the family <WH4940> of the Zarhites. <WH2227>
And the sons <WH1121> of Pharez <WH6557> were; <WH1961> of Hezron, <WH2696> the family <WH4940> of the Hezronites: <WH2697> of Hamul, <WH2538> the family <WH4940> of the Hamulites. <WH2539>

These <WH428> are the families <WH4940> of Judah <WH3063> according to those that were numbered <WH6485> of them, threescore and sixteen <WH8337> <WH7657> thousand <WH505> and five <WH2568> hundred. <WH3967>
Of the sons <WH1121> of Issachar <WH3485> after their families: <WH4940> of Tola, <WH8439> the family <WH4940> of the Tolaites: <WH8440> of Pua, <WH6312> the family <WH4940> of the Punites: <WH6324>
Of Jashub, <WH3437> the family <WH4940> of the Jashubites: <WH3432> of Shimron, <WH8110> the family <WH4940> of the Shimronites. <WH8117>

These <WH428> are the families <WH4940> of Issachar <WH3485> according to those that were numbered <WH6485> of them, threescore <WH8346> and four <WH702> thousand <WH505> and three <WH7969> hundred. <WH3967>

Of the sons <WH1121> of Zebulun <WH2074> after their families: <WH4940> of Sered, <WH5624> the family <WH4940> of the Sardites: <WH5625> of Elon, <WH356> the family <WH4940> of the Elonites: <WH440> of Jahleel, <WH3177> the family <WH4940> of the Jahleelites. <WH3178>
These <WH428> are the families <WH4940> of the Zebulunites <WH2075> according to those that were numbered <WH6485> of them, threescore <WH8346> thousand <WH505> and five <WH2568> hundred. <WH3967>
The sons <WH1121> of Joseph <WH3130> after their families <WH4940> were Manasseh <WH4519> and Ephraim. <WH669>

Of the sons <WH1121> of Manasseh: <WH4519> of Machir, <WH4353> the family <WH4940> of the Machirites: <WH4354> and Machir <WH4353> begot <WH3205> <WH853> Gilead: <WH1568> of Gilead <WH1568> come the family <WH4940> of the Gileadites. <WH1569>
These <WH428> are the sons <WH1121> of Gilead: <WH1568> of Jeezer, <WH372> the family <WH4940> of the Jeezerites: <WH373> of Helek, <WH2507> the family <WH4940> of the Helekites: <WH2516>
And of Asriel, <WH844> the family <WH4940> of the Asrielites: <WH845> and of Shechem, <WH7928> the family <WH4940> of the Shechemites: <WH7930>
And of Shemida, <WH8061> the family <WH4940> of the Shemidaites: <WH8062> and of Hepher, <WH2660> the family <WH4940> of the Hepherites. <WH2662>

And Zelophehad <WH6765> the son <WH1121> of Hepher <WH2660> had <WH1961> no <WH3808> sons, <WH1121> but <WH3588> <WH518> daughters: <WH1323> and the names <WH8034> of the daughters <WH1323> of Zelophehad <WH6765> were Mahlah, <WH4244> and Noah, <WH5270> Hoglah, <WH2295> Milcah, <WH4435> and Tirzah. <WH8656>
These <WH428> are the families <WH4940> of Manasseh, <WH4519> and those that were numbered <WH6485> of them, fifty <WH2572> and two <WH8147> thousand <WH505> and seven <WH7651> hundred. <WH3967>

These <WH428> are the sons <WH1121> of Ephraim <WH669> after their families: <WH4940> of Shuthelah, <WH7803> the family <WH4940> of the Shuthalhites: <WH8364> of Becher, <WH1071> the family <WH4940> of the Bachrites: <WH1076> of Tahan, <WH8465> the family <WH4940> of the Tahanites. <WH8470>
And these <WH428> are the sons <WH1121> of Shuthelah: <WH7803> of Eran, <WH6197> the family <WH4940> of the Eranites. <WH6198>

These <WH428> are the families <WH4940> of the sons <WH1121> of Ephraim <WH669> according to those that were numbered <WH6485> of them, thirty <WH7970> and two <WH8147> thousand <WH505> and five <WH2568> hundred. <WH3967> These <WH428> are the sons <WH1121> of Joseph <WH3130> after their families. <WH4940>

The sons <WH1121> of Benjamin <WH1144> after their families: <WH4940> of Bela, <WH1106> the family <WH4940> of the Belaites: <WH1108> of Ashbel, <WH788> the family <WH4940> of the Ashbelites: <WH789> of Ahiram, <WH297> the family <WH4940> of the Ahiramites: <WH298>
Of Shupham, <WH8197> the family <WH4940> of the Shuphamites: <WH7781> of Hupham, <WH2349> the family <WH4940> of the Huphamites. <WH2350>

And the sons <WH1121> of Bela <WH1106> were <WH1961> Ard <WH714> and Naaman: <WH5283> of Ard, the family <WH4940> of the Ardites: <WH716> and of Naaman, <WH5283> the family <WH4940> of the Naamites. <WH5280>

These <WH428> are the sons <WH1121> of Benjamin <WH1144> after their families: <WH4940> and they that were numbered <WH6485> of them were forty <WH705> and five <WH2568> thousand <WH505> and six <WH8337> hundred. <WH3967>

These <WH428> are the sons <WH1121> of Dan <WH1835> after their families: <WH4940> of Shuham, <WH7748> the family <WH4940> of the Shuhamites. <WH7749> These <WH428> are the families <WH4940> of Dan <WH1835> after their families. <WH4940>

All <WH3605> the families <WH4940> of the Shuhamites, <WH7749> according to those that were numbered <WH6485> of them, were threescore <WH8346> and four <WH702> thousand <WH505> and four <WH702> hundred. <WH3967>

Of the children <WH1121> of Asher <WH836> after their families: <WH4940> of Jimna, <WH3232> the family <WH4940> of the Jimnites: <WH3232> of Jesui, <WH3440> the family <WH4940> of the Jesuites: <WH3441> of Beriah, <WH1283> the family <WH4940> of the Beriites. <WH1284>
Of the sons <WH1121> of Beriah: <WH1283> of Heber, <WH2268> the family <WH4940> of the Heberites: <WH2277> of Malchiel, <WH4439> the family <WH4940> of the Malchielites. <WH4440>
And the name <WH8034> of the daughter <WH1323> of Asher <WH836> was Sarah. <WH8294>

These <WH428> are the families <WH4940> of the sons <WH1121> of Asher <WH836> according to those that were numbered <WH6485> of them; who were fifty <WH2572> and three <WH7969> thousand <WH505> and four <WH702> hundred. <WH3967>

Of the sons <WH1121> of Naphtali <WH5321> after their families: <WH4940> of Jahzeel, <WH3183> the family <WH4940> of the Jahzeelites: <WH3184> of Guni, <WH1476> the family <WH4940> of the Gunites: <WH1477>
Of Jezer, <WH3337> the family <WH4940> of the Jezerites: <WH3339> of Shillem, <WH8006> the family <WH4940> of the Shillemites. <WH8016>

These <WH428> are the families <WH4940> of Naphtali <WH5321> according to their families: <WH4940> and they that were numbered <WH6485> of them were forty <WH705> and five <WH2568> thousand <WH505> and four <WH702> hundred. <WH3967>

These <WH428> were the numbered <WH6485> of the children <WH1121> of Israel, <WH3478> six <WH8337> hundred <WH3967> thousand <WH505> and a thousand <WH505> seven <WH7651> hundred <WH3967> and thirty. <WH7970>
And the LORD <WH3068> spoke <WH1696> unto <WH413> Moses, <WH4872> saying, <WH559>
Unto these <WH428> the land <WH776> shall be divided <WH2505> for an inheritance <WH5159> according to the number <WH4557> of names. <WH8034>

To many <WH7227> thou shalt give the more <WH7235> inheritance, <WH5159> and to few <WH4592> thou shalt give the less <WH4591> inheritance: <WH5159> to every one <WH376> shall his inheritance <WH5159> be given <WH5414> according to <WH6310> those that were numbered <WH6485> of him.
Notwithstanding <WH389> <WH853> the land <WH776> shall be divided <WH2505> by lot: <WH1486> according to the names <WH8034> of the tribes <WH4294> of their fathers <WH1> they shall inherit. <WH5157>
According to <WH5921> <WH6310> the lot <WH1486> shall the possession <WH5159> thereof be divided <WH2505> between <WH996> many <WH7227> and few. <WH4592>

And these <WH428> are they that were numbered <WH6485> of the Levites <WH3881> after their families: <WH4940> of Gershon, <WH1648> the family <WH4940> of the Gershonites: <WH1649> of Kohath, <WH6955> the family <WH4940> of the Kohathites: <WH6956> of Merari, <WH4847> the family <WH4940> of the Merarites. <WH4848>

These <WH428> are the families <WH4940> of the Levites: <WH3881> the family <WH4940> of the Libnites, <WH3864> the family <WH4940> of the Hebronites, <WH2276> the family <WH4940> of the Mahlites, <WH4250> the family <WH4940> of the Mushites, <WH4188> the family <WH4940> of the Korathites. <WH7145> And Kohath <WH6955> begot <WH3205> <WH853> Amram. <WH6019>

And the name <WH8034> of Amram's <WH6019> wife <WH802> was Jochebed, <WH3115> the daughter <WH1323> of Levi, <WH3878> whom <WH834> her mother bore <WH3205> to Levi <WH3878> in Egypt: <WH4714> and she bore <WH3205> unto Amram <WH6019> <WH853> Aaron <WH175> and Moses, <WH4872> and Miriam <WH4813> their sister. <WH269>
And unto Aaron <WH175> was born <WH3205> <WH853> Nadab, <WH5070> and Abihu, <WH30> <WH853> Eleazar, <WH499> and Ithamar. <WH385>
And Nadab <WH5070> and Abihu <WH30> died, <WH4191> when they offered <WH7126> strange <WH2114> fire <WH784> before <WH6440> the LORD. <WH3068>

And those that were numbered <WH6485> of them were <WH1961> twenty <WH6242> and three <WH7969> thousand, <WH505> all <WH3605> males <WH2145> from a month <WH2320> old <WH4480> <WH1121> and upward: <WH4605> for <WH3588> they were not <WH3808> numbered <WH6485> among <WH8432> the children <WH1121> of Israel, <WH3478> because <WH3588> there was no <WH3808> inheritance <WH5159> given <WH5414> them among <WH8432> the children <WH1121> of Israel. <WH3478>

These <WH428> are they that were numbered <WH6485> by Moses <WH4872> and Eleazar <WH499> the priest, <WH3548> who <WH834> numbered <WH6485> <WH853> the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> in the plains <WH6160> of Moab <WH4124> by <WH5921> Jordan <WH3383> near Jericho. <WH3405>

But among these <WH428> there was <WH1961> not <WH3808> a man <WH376> of them whom Moses <WH4872> and Aaron <WH175> the priest <WH3548> numbered, <WH4480> <WH6485> when <WH834> they numbered <WH6485> <WH853> the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> in the wilderness <WH4057> of Sinai. <WH5514>

For <WH3588> the LORD <WH3068> had said <WH559> of them, They shall surely die <WH4191> <WH4191> in the wilderness. <WH4057> And there was not <WH3808> left <WH3498> a man <WH376> of <WH4480> them, save <WH3588> <WH518> Caleb <WH3612> the son <WH1121> of Jephunneh, <WH3312> and Joshua <WH3091> the son <WH1121> of Nun. <WH5126>
